Name: Industry Accelerators
Description: The IBM Industry Accelerators are a suite of collections of various artifacts intended to address a particular business or industry issue.

Name: Loan Default Analysis
Description: The collection of concepts and metrics useful for analysis of loans which are not being repaid according to their agreed conditions, with a view to recognizing characteristics that might indicate a risk of future defaults and potential credit losses.
